TopicTitle: Guess What I'm Building From the Shadow!

Articles.Content:
CURRENT SHADOW WE'RE GUESSING ABOUT: None, as we are waiting on cantab to post it

This is kinda like I, Spy: First a user (me) posts the shadow cast in the VAB or SPH of the craft he or she is constructing, and then everyone tries to guess what it is. Whoever's the first to get reasonably close (e.g. "Mun Lander" should count even if it's technically a "Mun Canyon Kerbal Tire Reinflation Specialist Deployment Vehicle") gets to post the shadow of what he or she is building and have everyone else guess, etc. etc.

To start, guess what THIS is!

Oh, and P.S.: When someone does guess right, be a sport and post the rest of the picture so we can see your beautiful ship and marvel at how it managed to cast that unusual shadow.

Edited July 9, 2014 by parameciumkid
Horizontal takeoff rocket.
Ion probe?
missile launcher?

Interplanetary cruiser?

or some star trek ship? (if not allowed to post twice, this one is my guess)

Nope. Keep guessing. ^^

Hint: It's not actually what it looks like.
???
Interstellar's fission reactor with a bunch of radiators?
A watercraft.
It's a quark-gluon plasma!
Perhaps there should be a thing so that it goes to another shadow if people guess enough times.

I'll wait till Monday and then if nobody's guessed it I'll put up an easier one. Seems I was overly confident in everyone's ability to guess ^^; That or my vehicle is weirder than I thought.

'nother hint: If you couldn't tell, this is a shot from the SPH.
It looks like a star trek ship, Perhaps ze stargazer
Well, I may as well go with the blindingly obvious and guess: A spaceplane?

Well, I may as well go with the blindingly obvious and guess: A spaceplane?

No! It can't be that ovibus

Destroyer wins for being the closest, since while unintentional he did say "bus", which is what it is:

Now Destroyer gets to post a shadow and see if anyone identifies it!
Next craft?
A suicide boat?
Destroyer's supposed to post the next one, but if he doesn't in the next day or two I'll either post a new one myself or just declare that anyone can post it.
6 solar panels, a fuel tank, some wheels, and a command pod??

Ooookayyy... so Destroyer was a no-show.

To rehash: the rules of the game are that whoever guesses what the current shadow represents posts the next one. So here's a second one from me, which should be an easy one.
Ultralight lander.
Okayyy, I clearly made that one TOO easy. Cantab wins and gets to post the next shadow!
If you tilt your head to the right, it does look a little bit like a Transformer. Just without the arms and the legs.
